statements: SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) as Num_Customers FROM customer_demographics GROUP BY city HAVING Num_Customers > 1 ORDER BY Num_Customers DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT gender, AVG(age) as Average_Age FROM customer_demographics GROUP BY gender;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE age <= 25;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age >= 40;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT first_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 30 ORDER BY first_name ASC
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(customer_id) FROM customers JOIN segments ON customers.customer_id = segments.segment_id GROUP BY segment_name HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 1
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, age, state FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, city, state FROM customers WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE demographic_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customers WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city, state FROM customers WHERE city='New York';

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, demographic_name FROM customers JOIN customer_demographics ON customers.customer_id = customer_demographics.customer_id JOIN demographics ON demographics.demographic_id = customer_demographics.demographic_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE state='California' AND city='Los Angeles';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM customers WHERE age <= 25;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender='Male' ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE gender='Female' OR age < 25 ORDER BY age
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM customers ORDER BY gender
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, age FROM customers WHERE city='New York';
SELECT customer_id, income, education_level FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, income, education_level, marital_status FROM customers INNER JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT customer_id, category, product_type, purchase_history FROM preferences WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, segment, conversion_rate FROM campaign_targets INNER JOIN campaigns ON campaign_targets.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, gender, occupation FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
